recommendations: Dhruv Sharma â€œI've had the pleasure of working with Aditya as Product Manager at Fareye. He is the ideal person you would want to have on your team, the kind of positive energy he brings to the group is commendable. This enabled us to win as a group as we did in all the projects Aditya touched. His skills of collaboration, documentation, going the extra mile and getting things done smoothly no matter how complex the challenge, has always been admired here at Fareye. I am confident he will be an asset to any team he would join. Wishing you all the best, I know I will be constantly learning from you as you grow in your journey.â€

Suvrat Joshi â€œAditya is an amazing product manager with a strong customer centric and business perspective, coupled with the ability to execute and deliver. For his area, Aditya created a strong vision and inspired the team to bring their best everyday. He brought a positive energy to the team and I look forward to working with Aditya again someday !â€
